text: khnhom minban niyeay towkean puokke krawpi avei del trong ban brae khnhom aoy niyeay tha chaur puok anak korp sakkar champoh a l laoh chea mcheasa robsakhnhom ning chea mcheasa robsa puok anak noh laey . haey khnhom chea saksaei leu puokke dreabnea khnhom nowknongchamnaom puokke . te nowpel del trong ban b pea ch b chivit robsakhnhom trong chea anakakhleameul towleu puokke . haey trong chea saksaei leu avei teangoasa
